definition: to freeze/to feel very cold/aspic or jelly
earth/dust/clay/local/indigenous/crude opium/unsophisticated/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]

sentences.english: What should people living in permafrost areas be doing to adapt to these changes?
sentences.chinese: 住在永凍土區域的人們應該做着什麼適應這些變動？

sentences.english: The ice in permafrost provides an important physical structure for the frozen soil.
sentences.chinese: 在永凍土的冰爲凍土提供一個重要物理結構。

sentences.english: The sediments would release a lot of nutrients normally locked up in permafrost into freshwater cycles.
sentences.chinese: 沉積將發佈在永凍土通常鎖的很多營養素入淡水週期。
